statements: SELECT lab_id, lab_name, lab_status FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_status = FALSE;
SELECT lab_name, lab_description FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_id > 2;
SELECT lab_name FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_status = TRUE;
SELECT lab_id, lab_description FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT lab_name, lab_description FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_id = 123
SELECT lab_name, lab_status FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_id > 100 ORDER BY lab_name ASC
SELECT lab_name, lab_description FROM virtual_lab_environment WHERE lab_status = FALSE ORDER BY lab_id DESC
SELECT lab_id, lab_name, lab_description, lab_status FROM virtual_lab_environment
SELECT * FROM virtual_lab_students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_year FROM virtual_lab_students WHERE enrolled_year > 2019;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_description FROM virtual_lab_experiments WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, lab_section FROM virtual_lab_students WHERE lab_section = 'A';
SELECT * FROM virtual_lab_experiments ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lab_students;
SELECT student_name, lab_section FROM virtual_lab_students WHERE enrolled_year = 2021;

SELECT student_name, experiment_name, experiment_description FROM virtual_lab_students JOIN virtual_lab_experiments ON virtual_lab_students.student_id = virtual_lab_experiments.student_id WHERE enrolled_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lab_experiments WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, student_name, lab_section FROM virtual_lab_experiments JOIN virtual_lab_students ON virtual_lab_experiments.student_id = virtual_lab_students.student_id;
SELECT lab_id, lab_name FROM lab_environment;
SELECT * FROM lab_task ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM lab_task WHERE lab_id = 1;
SELECT lab_id, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM lab_task GROUP BY lab_id;
SELECT DISTINCT progress_status FROM lab_progress WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM lab_environment WHERE lab_id = 1;
SELECT lab_name, lab_description FROM lab_environment ORDER BY lab_name DESC;
SELECT lab_task.task_name, lab_progress.progress_status FROM lab_task JOIN lab_progress ON lab_task.task_id = lab_progress.task_id;
SELECT lab_task.task_name, lab_progress.progress_status FROM lab_task JOIN lab_progress ON lab_task.task_id = lab_progress.task_id WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT lab_name, COUNT(lab_task.task_id) AS task_count FROM lab_environment LEFT JOIN lab_task ON lab_environment.lab_id = lab_task.lab_id GROUP BY lab_name ORDER BY task_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_course FROM students WHERE student_course IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_course FROM students WHERE student_course = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, enrollment_grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE enrollment_grade >= 'B';
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3 ORDER BY course_credit DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date, assignment_points FROM assignments WHERE assignment_due_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assignment_points DESC, assignment_due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT username, email, password FROM users;
SELECT course_name, instructor, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT enrollment_date, u.username, c.course_name FROM enrollments e JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline, course_name FROM assignments a JOIN courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.user_id, u.username, s.grade FROM submissions s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id ORDER BY s.grade DESC;
